body_html:
Okay, but then shouldn't the name of the Lambda layer be incremented unconditionally as well?
It does not do so in the above MWE, and this then is ambiguous behavior to me, as Lambda should behave identical to Conv3D since both are tf.keras.layers layers

body:
Okay, but then shouldn't the name of the `Lambda` layer be incremented unconditionally as well?
It does not do so in the above MWE, and this then is ambiguous behavior to me, as `Lambda` should behave identical to `Conv3D` since both are `tf.keras.layers` layers
